name: Hyper Day 2
description:
What is this?

Have fun trying to get to the back of your enemies, so to kill them! You can also attack from long distance, but just 1 throw at a time. Maybe too hard? Don't worry, your player has an extremely useful technique... Teleport between walls!

 

How to play

Move your player with WASD keys, while your player is constantly aiming towards your mouse. Look around moving it and throw your sword / melee-attack them pressing the Left button.

For last, but not least, you can teleport from the down-side to the top of the map pressing Left shift while moving towards a wall. It also works from left to right and back. Seems easy? Don't overestimate the small battlefield you are placed into... ;D

IMPORTANT: Close the game using Alt+F4
